sentence.Network_en: His total disinterest in money puzzled his family.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对金钱毫无兴趣使他的家人感到迷惑不解。

sentence.Network_en: It is to the disinterest of the public.
The fact Liberia has no oil seems to explain foreign disinterest in its internal affairs.
sentence.Network_cn: 利比里亚没有石油，这一事实似乎解释了为什么外部势力无意过问其内政。

entry.def: If there is disinterest in something, people are not interested in it.

example.ex: The fact Liberia has no oil seems to explain foreign disinterest in its internal affairs...
example.tran: 利比里亚没有石油，这一事实似乎解释了为什么外部势力无意过问其内政。

example.ex: We have had to contend with the disinterest of much of the medical profession about this topic.
example.tran: 我们必须全力对付很多医疗界人士对这一话题的冷漠。

means.word_mean: 1. tolerance attributable to a lack of involvement
